document.full_text: researchers found that the two-tone surface of the moon iapetus is a result of dust, the moon's rotation on its axis, and water ice's refreezing.
document.title: observatory: solving a tonal mystery in orbit around saturn
lines_and_colors: researchers found that the two-tone surface of the moon iapetus is a result of dust, the moon's rotation on its axis, and water ice's refreezing.
